page.title: 03LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
In my area Hacton School has Brownies every Wednesday night. My sister is going soon. There is a field down the bottom of my road and down the other side of my road there is a park for younger children. My neighbour spends his time in the garden and my other neighbour takes their dogs down the field every week. My mum spends time in the garden weeding and she also does the cooking. My dad spends his time planting seed in his little bit of garden. I spend my time sewing or helping in the garden. My sister helps me or starts playing. My brother usually goes round the block on his bike with his friends.
by Petra Jones SANDERS DRAPER SCHOOL
